name: R0-B0L and Nebula
description:
A rogue block segment, R0-B0L, is attempting to escape its certain demise with the help of Nebula. Nebula helps R0-B0L out by dropping prefabricated robotic blocks to get to the top of the factory. Watch out though! A sea of acid is close behind your ascent and the security robots will make your climb difficult. Using the power of teamwork, play as either character with a friend. Or, if you’re brave enough, play as both! Happy hoppin’ in R0-B0L & Nebula!

William Brotherton: Art, Design

Andrew Hunt: Programming, Design

Michael O'Donnell: Art, Design, Sound

Austin Nordhaus: Music

Special thanks to Michael St. Louis for an important bug fix that really saved the game!

You can change the control setup in the help menu. Press escape to leave the menu.
